posts.post_title: FS  Half t206 set 224 raw   SOLD    SOLD
posts.post_content:
Selling my partial t206 raw set.  Average grade is good to vg.  There's 224 cards including SLers, Hofers, and even a decent O'Hara.
Breakdown-  Prices are conservative

17 $25 commons   $425
87 $20 commons   $1740
93 $15 commons   $1395
09 $40 SLers          $360
18 $50 HOFers        $900
08 $80 more Hofers  $640
01 $800 O'Hara            
=$6260 total  I'll take $5,750 for all of em.  This is a good deal people.  [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]
Great lot.  Love seeing these beauties in their natural state.  Good luck with the sale.
Hey Doug, which ad is on the back of Street catching?
